mapper.select: SELECT a.id AS id, a.fault_no, a.type, a.tdate AS startime, a.comment, b.register, b.repairman, b.tdate, c.name, c.location, c.lamp_pole_num AS polenumber, c.c_client_id, d.client_code AS code FROM b_client_fault AS a LEFT JOIN b_client_repair AS b ON a.id = b.b_client_fault_id LEFT JOIN c_client_attr1 AS c ON a.c_client_id = c.c_client_id LEFT JOIN c_client AS d ON c.c_client_id = d.id WHERE a.id = #{id ,jdbcType=INTEGER} GROUP BY a.id

SELECT a.id AS id, a.fault_no, a.type, a.tdate AS startime, a.comment, b.register, b.repairman, b.tdate, c.name, c.location, c.lamp_pole_num AS polenumber, c.c_gateway_id, d.gateway_code AS code FROM b_gateway_fault AS a LEFT JOIN b_gateway_repair AS b ON a.id = b.b_gateway_fault_id LEFT JOIN c_gateway_attr1 AS c ON a.c_gateway_id = c.c_gateway_id LEFT JOIN c_gateway AS d ON c.c_gateway_id = d.id WHERE a.id = #{id ,jdbcType=INTEGER} GROUP BY a.id
